elements.name: Convert a template from a draft to a Template

steps.name: That I have opened the Achieve <$env> in the <$browser>
I elect to login as "mediaProducer1" user
I elect to edit the course named "course.templatename"
I elect to update the value of the course to the the following values
I validate that the course card named "course.templatename" exists on the course page with the status of "Template"
I sign out of Achieve

elements.name: Assign the course to an instructor

steps.name: That I have opened the Achieve <$env> in the <$browser>
I elect to login as "Admin1" user
I copy the course named "$course.templatename" to the name "$course.name"
I open the Manage Instructors page on the course named "$course.name"
I manage the instructors on the course and add the "instructor1" loginUser
I validate that the Course Specific Link opens the course named "$course.name"
I close the Manage Instructors page

elements.name: As an instructor, login and mange the course settings and invite students

I elect to login as "Instructor1" user
I elect to edit the course named "$course.name"
I elect to update the value of the course to the the following values
I validate that the course card named "$course.name" exists on the course page with the status of "Active"
I capture the invite link and store to variable "inviteLink"
I populate the Invite Students page with the following data:
